node.title: Health Evangelism, Part 2
node.description: “Christ’s method alone will give true success in reaching the people. The Savior mingled with men as one who desired their good. He showed His sympathy for them, ministered to their needs, and won their confidence. Then He bade them, ‘Follow Me.’” Gospel Workers p. 363. How can we follow in the footsteps of Jesus Christ and apply His method which alone will give success? What part does the health work play in reaching out to others with the message of salvation?
